stories.title: The Art of Penguin Science Fiction

stories.text:
After being frustrated with the budget and learning curve requirements of the big names in the Virtual Production field, I decided to create my own all-in-one platform designed with beginners and less-technical folk in mind. It takes complicated tasks in other engines and makes them two-click solutions. And, with the free companion mobile app, you can track cameras, scan your sets, and (coming soon) do full body motion capture!

There's a ton more features that I'm super proud of, and I'm open to any and all feedback! Thanks!
stories.title: Show HN: I built an all-in-one virtual production platform for indies

stories.text:
I went to log into netlify and got an error saying there was no user for that email/password combo. I asked my partner to log into her account and she had the same issue. We both tried to reset the passwords for our accounts and received no emails.

What’s up?
stories.title: Ask HN: Is Netlify Acting Wonky?

stories.text:
Hey HN -

I've been having a hard time getting back into gaming when I'm in-and-out of it so often with particular games, so I built a very simple tool in my spare time to help folks find people to game with.

I tried to minimize friction: no user account needed & you specify the game. You can search for specific games too or usernames even.

It's still in alpha stage, meaning it's super barebones and cool features that integrate with your current apps aren't there yet. We'll get there though.

Let me know if you have questions or recs!
stories.title: Show HN: Lightweight tool to find people to game with
